self_predictions.prediction_summary: Levan predicts a dominant victory over Ermes, stating Ermes has no chance and will likely run away after being defeated.
self_predictions.style_conflict: Levan criticizes Ermes' training methods, particularly his back pressure technique, calling it useless and not specific to armwrestling.

Ermes Gasparini.strength: Levan believes Ermes' strength is overrated, especially his back pressure technique.
Ermes Gasparini.previous_match_summary: Levan references their previous match where Ermes was injured and ran away after losing.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Levan gives Devon a slight edge (60-40) due to his experience and ability to control the setup and straps.

Devon Larratt.strength: Levan respects Devon's experience and psychological edge.
Devon Larratt.health: Mentions Devon's back issues affecting his training.
Devon Larratt.previous_match_summary: References Devon's past performances and trash-talking skills.

Vitaly Laletin.strength: Acknowledges Vitaly's potential for a fast hit.
Vitaly Laletin.previous_match_summary: Notes Vitaly's calm demeanor and previous victories.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Levan believes Todd's previous win was due to referee errors and predicts Irakli will win in a fair rematch.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Criticizes Todd's elbow fouls in their previous match.

Irakli Zirakashvili.previous_match_summary: References the controversial loss to Todd.

Todd Hutchings.previous_match_summary: Criticizes Todd's behavior and refereeing in their last match.
